Features.Name: Data Quality Server Files
Features.Description: Copies the files required for completing the Data Quality Server installation

Features.Name: Integration Services
Features.Description: Includes the designer, runtime, and utilities that enable Integration Services to move, integrate, and transform data between data stores.

Features.Name: Master Data Services
Features.Description: Installs the Master Data Services Configuration Manager, assemblies, PowerShell snap-in, and folders and files for Web applications and services.

Features.Name: Books Online
Features.Description: Installs SQL Server Books Online components to view and manage help content

Features.Name: Management Tools Basic
Features.Description: Installs SQL Server Management Tools – Basic

Features.Name: Management Tools Complete
Features.Description: Installs SQL Server Management Tools – Complete

Features.Name: SDK for MicrosoftSQL Server Native Client
Features.Description: Installs SDK for MicrosoftSQL Server Native Client

Parameters.Name: Source files path
Parameters.Description: (Required) UNC path to the root of the source files for installation

Parameters.Name: Product key
Parameters.Description: Product key for licensed installations.

Parameters.Name: SQL Server - Collation
Parameters.Description: Collation to use for the Database Engine

Parameters.Name: SQL Server - Enable TCP/IP
Parameters.Description: Specify 0 to disable or 1 to enable the TCP/IP protocol

Parameters.Name: SQL Server - Administrator accounts
Parameters.Description: Comma separated list of administrator accounts that need to be provisioned

Parameters.Name: SQL Server - Service account
Parameters.Description: Account for SQL Server service: Domain\User or system account

Parameters.Name: SQL Server - Service startup type
Parameters.Description: Valid values are Automatic, Manual and Disabled

Parameters.Name: Browser - Service startup type
Parameters.Description: Valid values are Automatic, Manual and Disabled

Parameters.Name: Agent - Service startup type
Parameters.Description: Valid values are Automatic, Manual and Disabled

Parameters.Name: SQL Server - Security mode
Parameters.Description: Specifies the security mode for SQL Server. Supported value: SQL. If this parameter is not supplied, then Windows-only authentication mode is supported.

Parameters.Name: SQL Server - SA password
Parameters.Description: Specifies the password for the SQL Server SA account. Required when Security mode=SQL

Parameters.Name: SQL Server - data directory
Parameters.Description: Specifies the data directory for SQL Server data files

Parameters.Name: SQL Server - user data directory
Parameters.Description: Specifies the directory for the data files for user databases

Parameters.Name: SQL Server - user log directory
Parameters.Description: Specifies the directory for the log files for user databases

Parameters.Name: SQL Server - tempdb data directory
Parameters.Description: Specifies the directory for the data files for tempdb (leave blank for default value); (SQL Server 2016: when specifying more than one directory, separate the directories with a blank space. If multiple directories are specified the tempdb data files will be spread across the directories in a round-robin fashion.

Parameters.Name: SQL Server - tempdb log directory
Parameters.Description: Specifies the directory for tempdb log file (leave blank for default value)

Parameters.Name: SQL Server - backup directory
Parameters.Description: Specifies the directory for backup files (leave blank for default value)

Parameters.Name: Full Text - Launcher service account
Parameters.Description: Specifies the account for Full-Text filter launcher service

Parameters.Name: FILESTREAM feature - Level
Parameters.Description: Level to enable FILESTREAM feature

Values.Name: Enabled for Transact-SQL and Win32 streaming access

Parameters.Name: FILESTREAM feature - Share name
Parameters.Description: Name of Windows share to be created for FILESTREAM File I/O. Leave blank is feature is disabled

Parameters.Name: Integration Services - Service account
Parameters.Description: Account for Integration Services: Domain\User or system account

Parameters.Name: Integration Services - Service startup type
Parameters.Description: Startup type for Integration Services. Valid values are Automatic, Manual and Disabled

Parameters.Name: Analysis Services - Service startup type
Parameters.Description: Valid values are Automatic, Manual and Disabled

Parameters.Name: Analysis Services - Collation
Parameters.Description: For list of valid values refer to SQL Server Documentation

Parameters.Name: Analysis Services - allow MSOLAP run in process
Parameters.Description: Specifies whether or not the MSOLAP provider is allowed to run in process. Valid values are 1 and 0

Parameters.Name: Analysis Services - Administrator accounts
Parameters.Description: Comma separated list of administrator accounts that need to be provisioned

Parameters.Name: Analysis Services - Server mode
Parameters.Description: Specifies the server mode of the Analysis Services instance. Valid values are MULTIDIMENSIONAL and TABULAR

Parameters.Name: Distributed Replay Controller - Computer name
Parameters.Description: The computer name that the client communicates with for the Distributed Replay Controller service

Parameters.Name: Distributed Replay Client - Service startup type
Parameters.Description: Valid values are Automatic, Manual and Disabled

Parameters.Name: Distributed Replay Client - result directory
Parameters.Description: The result directory for the Distributed Replay Client service

Parameters.Name: Distributed Replay Client - working directory
Parameters.Description: The working directory for the Distributed Replay Client service

Parameters.Name: Distributed Replay Controller - service administrators
Parameters.Description: Comma separated list of Windows account(s) used to grant permission to the Distributed Replay Controller service

Parameters.Name: Distributed Replay Controller - service account
Parameters.Description: The account used by the Distributed Replay Controller service

Parameters.Name: Distributed Replay Controller - service startup type
Parameters.Description: The startup type for the Distributed Replay Controller service

Parameters.Name: Reporting Services - Service Account
Parameters.Description: Specifies which account the report server service should execute under.  When omitted or when the value is empty string, the default built-in account for the current operating system. The username part of RSSVCACCOUNT is a maximum of 20 characters long and the domain part of RSSVCACCOUNT is a maximum of 254 characters long

Parameters.Name: Reporting Services - Service startup type
Parameters.Description: Valid values are Automatic, Manual and Disabled
